findings.title: Incorrect calculations in comment on L21
findings.description: Comment on Line 21 has incorrect calculations, stating 1 million tokens at 18 decimals is equal to 10^24 base units.

findings.title: Centralization of power and lack of restriction on minting tokens
findings.description: The SuperRare token deployer address can mint additional tokens to arbitrary addresses without any restriction and can pause all transfers, leading to censorship.

findings.title: Potential for censorship due to unrestricted token minting and transfer rule updates
findings.description: The SuperRare token deployer address can mint additional tokens to arbitrary addresses without any restriction and can pause all transfers, leading to censorship.
